title: Democrats Meet for First Debate Since Impeachment Push Began
text:
WASHINGTON—Former Vice President Joe Biden, Massachusetts Sen. Elizabeth Warren and 10 other Democrats will try to show they have the best chance of beating President Trump when they gather Tuesday in Ohio for the first debate since House Democrats launched an impeachment inquiry against Mr. Trump.

Mr. Trump’s attempt to persuade Ukraine in a July phone call to investigate Mr. Biden and his son, Hunter Biden over their work in the country, is expected to be a central focus of the fourth Democratic presidential debate. Mr....
description: Former Vice President Joe Biden, Massachusetts Sen. Elizabeth Warren and 10 other Democrats will try to show they have the best chance of beating President Trump when they gather Tuesday in Ohio for the first debate since House Democrats launched an impeachment inquiry against Mr. Trump.
